meanings.sent1: Her actions showed great honorablenesses in the community.
meanings.sent2: The honorablenesses of his character were well-known.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being honorable.
meanings.sent1: In times of crisis, the honorablenesses of leaders shine through.
meanings.sent2: The honorablenesses of the agreement were questioned by many.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel found itself in a state of honorablenesses after returning the stolen acorn.
meanings.sent4: The honorablenesses of the mountain stood as a symbol of strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of honorablenesses in every brushstroke.
